Class OrderScreenController

project2.OrderScreenController
public class OrderScreenController extends Object
This class is for the order screen for servers.

Joanne Liu

    • loadScreen

      public void loadScreen(ArrayList<String> checkoutClickedButtons, HashMap<String,Integer> itemQuantities)
      This function updates the menu item buttons that are already pressed when switching between checkout screen back to order screen
      Parameters:
      checkoutClickedButtons - - names of menu items already in cart (ArrayList of string)
      itemQuantities - - names mapped to quantities of menu items (HashMap of String and Integer)

    • onButtonClick
